text: Ningĩ akiuma agacarie Ahazia, nao andũ a Jehu makĩnyiita Ahazia rĩrĩa eehithĩte Samaria. Akĩrehwo kũrĩ Jehu na akĩũragwo. Nao makĩmũthika nĩgũkorwo moigire atĩrĩ, “Aarĩ ũmwe wa ariũ a Jehoshafatu, ũrĩa warongoragia Jehova na ngoro yake yothe.” Nĩ ũndũ ũcio gũkĩaga mũndũ thĩinĩ wa nyũmba ya Ahazia warĩ na ũhoti mũiganu wa kũrũgamĩrĩra ũthamaki ũcio.
